review: This is not worth it. I would suggest just going ahead and purchasing Apple TV. In order for this device to work properly you have to be within 2.5 ft of you wireless router, which defeats the purpose of having a wifi enabled device. I just received it today and will be dropping it off to return tomorrow. It is pointless to say this device has increased wifi strength but then tell customers to sit within 2.5 ft of their wireless router to use the device.
author: Katrika Scott

review: As stated in the headline, this plays Prime Instant videos great after stalling at the very beginning for a second or two. After that there's rarely any loading or glitching. Playing Netflix or Hulu Plus, however, is a different story. Very often with both services the video will freeze or go black while the audio continues. With Netflix this fixes itself by speeding through the stalled video to catch up. With Hulu Plus, the video usually stays frozen until you stop the streaming and go back to it. On it's worst days, it will begin the episode from the beginning instead of resuming. This is completely frustrating!We purchased this as a means to take some of the load off of our aging Playstation 3, but there are sometimes when we have to fall back on that if we want to watch something uninterrupted.Save your money for a roku box or buy a chromecast if you use an android phone. That's my advice.
